abstract: The hirings are aimed at rejuvenating the drug maker’s lagging research operations.
snippet: The hirings are aimed at rejuvenating the drug maker’s lagging research operations.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the world’s largest drug maker, said yesterday that it had hired two senior scientists and promoted a third to rejuvenate its lagging research operations.

headline.main: Pfizer Hires 2 Top Scientists to Expand Drug Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Hires 2 Top Scientists to Expand Drug Pipeline
